<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Rounding mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Enumerates supported rounding modes, as well as some special values. The set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the modes must agree with IEEE-754, 4.3.1 and 4.3.2. The constants</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// assigned to the IEEE rounding modes must agree with the values used by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FLT&#95;ROUNDS (C11, 5.2.4.2.2p8).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This value is packed into bitfield in some cases, including \\c FPOptions, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the rounding mode values and the special value \\c Dynamic must fit into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the bit field (now - 3 bits). The value \\c Invalid is used only in values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returned by intrinsics to indicate errors, it should never be stored as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// rounding mode value, so it does not need to fit the bit fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the effective denormal mode if the mode if this caller calls into a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/denormalmode/#af397461b3c561d29aa674b4a4d3e5965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/denormalmode/#ad96de724aad364e26ee28cdf52fd6943">DenormalMode</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/denormalmode/#af397461b3c561d29aa674b4a4d3e5965">mergeCalleeMode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/denormalmode/#ad96de724aad364e26ee28cdf52fd6943">DenormalMode</a> Callee)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/denormalmode/#ad96de724aad364e26ee28cdf52fd6943">DenormalMode</a> MergedMode = Callee;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Callee.Input == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/denormalmode/#a29b26e3ae30f3f6ec4106ff181282893ab6083e266013055b6c2ef85b1e47444c">DenormalMode::Dynamic</a>)</span></CodeLine>
